website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a cleverly engineered train set that is fun for kids of all ages as well as a nice addition to your holiday decor, this is one to consider.
pros: A new model by a top name in train sets
Features an attractive holiday theme with lots of attention to detail
Components are well-made, and the track pieces are easy to put together
Looks great around the Christmas tree
cons: Some owners found the "train" sounds it makes to be annoying

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Christmas train set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this train for my 3 year old son after a previous train purchase had to be returned due to poor quality. This train, while still plastic, has held up perfectly to the abuse of my son and 1 year old daughter. Exactly what I had hoped for when purchasing a Lionel. He loves to control the train with the remote, sending it forwards and backwards. The train is set up around the Christmas tree and is a great accent. Looking forward to seeing how this train holds up over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Nik M.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt Work
customer_reviews.text: i never bought one of these kinds of trains before. i wanted to have it drive around my tree for Christmas. got it, set it up put batters in it, turned it on, and NOTHING. no lights, no bells, no whistles. only a red blinking light on remote. i checked every thing, batters, switch on remote, and 1st car. it just wouldnt go. so i sent it back for refound. very unhappy about it.
customer_reviews.author: christopher leuci

customer_reviews.title: A must for under the tree
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. It is a nice size train set and the train sounds are very life like.
customer_reviews.author: Mai N.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Holiday with this Train.
customer_reviews.text: My wife talking about her father used to have a train around the base of the Christmas Tree when she was growing up. Our son is turning three, so I thought I'd surprise my Wife with a bit of a throw back and also start a tradition with our son. They both loved it.
customer_reviews.author: BiggReddGuy

customer_reviews.title: Remote won’t pair; hey Lionel can I have my Christmas back?
customer_reviews.text: Primary gift for my four year old. Looks cool and the kid was stoked. Laid out the track, jacked in 9 batteries with kid excited out his mind, and... remote will NOT pair. Which of course means the train will do NOTHING. Why would a simple device like this have remote that needs to be paired? Why wouldn’t the train have a manual mode so that you could flip a switch and watch it go around the track without the remote? So now a four year old’s Christmas is shot and this will be a nightmare to return (pieces everywhere).
customer_reviews.author: Janessa Huez

customer_reviews.title: It fits around my 7.5 foot high Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: It fits around my 7.5 foot high tree without having to purchase additional tracks. Inner diameter is approximately 54 inches. One star off. I would have preferred brighter red and green paint colors.
customer_reviews.author: AttyRNPhD

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the most embarrassing moments of my life today. I bought this train for my nephew's birthday. When we assembled the track and set it up put batteries in it, turned it on, and ABSOLUTELY NOTHING. no lights, no bells, no whistles. only a red blinking light on the remote. very unhappy about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Masoud R. Tan

customer_reviews.title: Lionel North Pole Train Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this train when the price was $50. I think it lives up to that price point. The cars (Engine, Coal , Open, Caboose) are plastic as are the wheels. I believe the chassis is metal. The track connects and disconnects easily. It comes with pieces you can add to the track if used on carpet (to stabilize the track), although I used the train on carpet and had no problems. The remote is easy to use and the sounds are very authentic. I found the quality, for a plastic train, to be excellent. I would recommend it to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: JSco

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted..
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. A nice train, that is not cheap and will last us a few years. So far I feel this will. My 5 year old LOVES that it has a remote. It will go both forward and in reverse. Now, it does take 6 C Batteries for the head engine. But they've seemed to last us a couple of weeks so far.... would recommend this train!
customer_reviews.author: JasonKim Lebeda

customer_reviews.title: Also very annoying loud beep from Train Engine when remote control is ...
customer_reviews.text: Remote control music button malfunctioned almost immediately. Also very annoying loud beep from Train Engine when remote control is turned off and train is turned on, so you can't have on stand by without constant train noises and constant battery drain. Which leads me to my final complaint. Who the hell uses C batteries anymore?? If you pull this out once a year for a few days and don't mind if it breaks immediately go for it. This is by far a bigger rip off than Disneyland.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Parker

customer_reviews.title: Can't turn the sound off!
customer_reviews.text: The train overall is of decent quality - not great, but about what I would expect. The biggest drawback is the animated sound the train makes. We bought this set to run under our Christmas tree this year. If you turn it on...it makes animated train sounds. Not something you can leave running for a period of time to add ambiance. Very annoying overall sound. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for Xmas. I did not set it up until after Xmas. With a fresh set of batteries, the remote and the train simply do not connect. The train makes beeps, the remote has a light. There is nothing after that. Thankfully, Amazon is honoring the return. I was worried because I ordered this just after black friday. Otherwise, the trains are nicely made and decorative. The tracks are a little cheap and don't sit flush on the ground when setup in an oval. The remote has forward, reverse and buttons for sounds. Maybe next year I will buy a nicer set. Bottom line: make sure it works before the return period expires!
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were searching for
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what we were hoping it would be for a first train under grandma and grandpas christmas tree for our young grandsons. All features work perfectly right out of the box, seems sturdy, no derailing even while on low pile area rug. My husband had an N gauge model train set up when he was younger, so he knows his trains and what some of them can cost. He is impressed with this train and feels it’s a great buy. Really looking forward to the expression on the face of our 3 year old train enthusiast grandson when he sees this.
customer_reviews.author: retiredRN

customer_reviews.title: Cute but loud
customer_reviews.text: The colors are great, runs well, the North Pole theme is adorable--overall a cute train. My only criticism is that the motor on the train is quite loud, much louder than I was expecting. We were hoping to put the train around our Christmas tree and let it ride around, but the noise is just too much. Might need to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jeenah S.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute train and good quality, but it’s better to look at
customer_reviews.text: Really cute train and good quality, but it’s better to look at. If you actually want a functioning train that runs, look elsewhere. I’m told it’s an issue with all battery powered trains, but it didn’t even make it around a full circle before it stopped and wouldn’t go again. Talk about anticlimactic. I couldn’t even let my kids see it so that they wouldn’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Christmas Train
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and kid friendly! My three year old loves it and I think it will last us many years to come. Comes with plenty of track and multiple configuration options. Pictures is the extended circle which uses all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Christy S

customer_reviews.title: The kids love this Train!
customer_reviews.text: Our two Grandsons LOVE THIS TRAIN! It only takes a few minutes to put together and setup for them when we know they are coming over. They look forward to coming over to Grandma and Grandpa's house because the Train will be waiting for them. Train and controller run off of battery's. Conducter says "ALL ABOARD", "The ENGINE BELL RINGS", The WHISTLE BLOWS" and the "LIGHT ON THE ENGINE LIGHTS UP" when the Train turns on.
customer_reviews.author: T. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fun and lots of memories
customer_reviews.text: I work at a retirement community. We had a theme of Polar Express this year. The residents helped decorate the tree and wanted a train. This easy to set up, battery operated train has brought much joy to our community. Staff and residents can be see playing with the train. The reminiscing about trains has helped trigger memories long forgotten like: taking the train to visit, using a street car, watching model train in the Higbee's window, how model trains worked back in the day. So, glad we purchased and put it up around the tree.
customer_reviews.author: CreativeArts

customer_reviews.title: Christmas decor got a great upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: We are trying to add something noticeable to our Christmas decorations every year. This set was the highlight of this year. I have no idea why people are giving it bad reviews. Yes it’s plastic but it is durable and well made. Plus what do you expect for a $60 dollar budget??? It works very well!!! You can control the speed, make it go in reverse, and the train can make three different sounds. It DOES NOT blow smoke. You can also buy from Amazon additional tracks but even if you don’t, the set has enough to make a large circle. The set was a big hit with the kids and grownups! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dima Oksenkrug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our tree
customer_reviews.text: Our old train of about 12 years had finally died and we had no means of fixing it. We used it as a place holder for a year or two but it just wasn’t the same. Then we got this little guy and it’s seems like every family friend wants to play with it. It’s quality seems ok but does feel a bit cheaper than our old train. With that said it is a welcome addition to our Christmas tree. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JDeo

customer_reviews.title: Is company willing to prove I got a lemon?
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to get the train. We set it up added batteries and the train wouldn't move,. The wheels made one turn and that was it. Turned everything off,try again with same results, wheel turned half a turn and it was over. We packed it up and requested a refund. More then anything we wanted this train. I would try another one if The company wanted to offer it free, and I could write a new happy review. The gears just weren't right, so disappointing. Hopefully I just got a lemon. Just not willing to pay again to see. Kevin
customer_reviews.author: carol wyatt-miler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas train
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a good Christmas train for quite some time. I had been eyeballing this one for quite some time so when it went on sale for Black Friday I instantly scooped one up. I’m so glad that I did. This is incredibly well made. Sturdy track. The train and cars are a little tricky to get on the track but once hey are on they run very smoothly. My daughter loves this train too and has been playing with it since it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Delighted Grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to surprise my 3 year old granddaughter on Christmas morning. She can operate the train easily, and has no problem aligning the wheels to the train tracks. The large cars will transport some beanie baby stuffed animals easily. I'm sure the constant usage will drain the batteries quickly, as the older grandchildren also enjoy playing with this train. They have been busily constructing tunnels and scenery for the train to travel through. For the sale price prior to Christmas, this was a wonderful purchase. Thank you Lionel!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: A Great Christmas Train Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Lionel North Pole Central train set as a gift for next Christmas. I set it up to make sure it worked properly and immediately had problems with the locomotive and wireless control maintaining their connection. I contacted Lionel customer service about the problem and they sent me a replacement locomotive and control without delay. The new items worked perfectly. This train set is well made and will look great under a Christmas tree. It's easy to set up and operate if you read and follow the instructions. I think young kids will especially appreciate it. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: R D V

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to our Christmas tree!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this train set to put around our Christmas tree. It was easy to put together and it was a sturdy train set. Be aware that there are sound effects that play whenever the train is driving and cannot be turned off or down at all. It didn’t bother us, but it could be annoying to some. It has a neat feature that if you turn off the remote and not the train, it beeps to remind you turn off the train so the batteries don’t run down.
customer_reviews.author: FarmhouseMama

customer_reviews.title: perfect first time train set
customer_reviews.text: up and running in 15 min. perfect first time train....easy to assemble and use...noise effects including conductor announcement are perfect for 2 year old grandson. we bought the extra track for optional track patterns but I didnt realize we would be unable to create a figure 8. this set is basically a plug and play so is not highly configurable. note: we didnt have any issues with train or track...runs great!
customer_reviews.author: karen wessinger

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this train. It was cute for around our Christmas Tree. My main concerns are the train carts connector come loose easily and we would pose parts of the train on the track. The connectors need to be better. However, nothing prepared me for how LOUD this train set is. It's not something you can run all day because there's no volume button. Over all good for the price and since I'm only using it once a year for holidays it was an ok investment.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love it! My 1st Lionel train! Do not forget to buy the LR14 battery from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Super durable and give us lots of fun! All the family love it. It uses 6x LR14, or the C type batteries. like this one:  You can buy the rechargeable one (~$3 each) or the non-rechargeable one (~$1). Also need 3x AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Payson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Christmas Tree Train!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought This For My Christmas Tree and It Is Perfect!! It Fits Under The Tree Just The Right Size! It Works Great So Far ..Have Only Used For About a Week Now and I Love It!! Very Well Made and The Sounds Are REAL Sounding!! Thank You So Much Lionel!! (Bought Quite a Few Months Ago Didn't Use Until Recently)
customer_reviews.author: Princess Peanut and Justify

customer_reviews.title: This will light up your grandchild.
customer_reviews.text: My 2- and 5-year old grandchildren play with this endlessly. I have to referee who gets to use the remote. The joy it brings to them has made my Christmas. This is very easy to assemble and easy to handle for little ones. I'm so glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: D Carls

customer_reviews.title: Lionel Train
customer_reviews.text: This train was great the first year we got it. My grandchildren really enjoyed it. When we took it out of the box this year, we reinstalled new batteries but could not get the train to work. We followed all of the directions without success. I knew to take the batteries out of it before we put it away after Christmas and we bought brand new batteries to install. No idea why it would not work.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie1

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice but not great train. Very big for my 6.5 feet tree. I hoped it would look good with my Christmas village figures, but looking weird. We had to move some of the furniture to fit the train rails as there is no way to make the circle smaller. May be better under bigger trees. Sound is loud however not annoying. Made fully from plastic and doesn’t seem to sturdy. If not my daughter who loved the train, i would definitely return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer2180

customer_reviews.title: Nicely assembled, Good Looking Train Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for my daughter & her husband for they have a set of twins, one girl and one boy. I gave it to them for Christmas but because they're only one year old, my son in law is going to wait until next Christmas to put it together. So that's why I only gave 4 stars. I'll be back to let you know when he has it together.
customer_reviews.author: dreammaker22

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! I was skeptical about buying a train for my tree on line without seeing it physically. However, I could not be happier with it. My dogs, on the other hand, were not impressed too much. hehe Anyway, I highly recommend this train for around the tree or anywhere. It comes with a lot of track so you will have plenty. My only wish is that there were more different pieces, like a sharper turn. Overall very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Breslin

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic Train Set
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much of a market for toy trains that go around the Christmas tree, but this brand seems to be the best and most affordable. I will be putting this under my tree every year for sure. When the train is turned on, it makes loud noises, which I wish could be turned off. Instead of turning the train on to go around the tree, I like to set it up in front of the tree to avoid the noise.
customer_reviews.author: TuckerSays

customer_reviews.title: Very nice train
customer_reviews.text: Very cute train. Plays music, has a whistle and a bell. Got it for our 5 year old as a Christmas present (he wanted a red train) and he loves it! It seems pretty durable and sturdy to stand up to a little boy’s rough play with it. Overall it seems to be a great first train (or just a durable train in general)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great train, but can't turn off all sounds
customer_reviews.text: My kids (3&6) love this train! It's a great size and has a lot of lovely little details that make it special. The track can be configured 3 different ways so it's very versatile. My one and only complaint is that you can't turn off all the sounds. While the train is on, it has a constant "chugging" sound. It's not terribly annoying but definitely not something I'd want to keep on for too long.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Great little train set
customer_reviews.text: We bought this train to go around our Christmas tree. It was easy to set up and is fun to use. It stays on the tracks well, even when going at its maximum speed around corners (zero derailments after dozens of laps). It is a neat train set, a good value for the money, and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Malin

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice train with good elctronic features.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a very, very nice play train. None of the other trains listed could beat it. There are no clear directions for assemblying. The parts are very, very stiff to manage as is the packaging of the train. The remote C size package was difficult and needed a very strong individual . But once unpacked and set up properly It is a extremly nice train for both adults and kids. We use this train around a tree and are very hhappy with our purchae and look forward to it's use for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: A cute train to set up under the xmas tree
customer_reviews.text: This is just a great train to have running around the christmas tree. It is not scalable and you can't buy add on's. It's just as is but is very cool and the kids love it. My only issue is when the train is at full speed it takes almost a full circle around the track to stop. The only problem with this is when the kids try to control it and it just won't stop where they want it to (so yeah it bugged me). Other than that it's a totally fun train to set up with tracks my 4 yr old grandson loved to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Consider train’s noises
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. It has enough tracks, I didn’t opt for the extra tracks and went around my Christmas tree fine. I like the remote control where you can choose speed and either forward or reverse. Only thing is noises can get a bit annoying, I thought the noises were only when you press the button on remote but constantly chugging as moves. Wanted to keep it constantly on going around tree but noises very loud.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but wish the train has a mute button cause it won’t stop honking the horn. Even a volume selector would be helpful. Looks great under the tree as a decoration. I don’t turn on the train for long. Very Christmas atmosphere with this next to the presents under the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but no way to turn off fake train noise
customer_reviews.text: This train has the right Christmas-look for under the tree but was ultimately a disappointment: - Sounds: when running, it makes a constant electronic train sound (synthesized track clatter, etc) but there is no way to turn the sound off. Was hoping to have it running under tree more often but the sound proved too much. - Reliability: started having some trouble that resulted in a constant beeping as if the remote was turned off. Couldn’t diagnose the source. Maybe low batteries, but we barely ran the thing due to the noise. If you don’t mind constant fake train noise, then this might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was so fun for us and the grandkids. Just a warning though, when is on it makes noises. Too bad it can't just chug along and make the noises when you choose to. Was happy to put it away after Christmas But.... We did love it and it will be so fun to pull it out year after year!
customer_reviews.author: nancy may

customer_reviews.title: Brining back the joy of Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Growing up we always had a train under the Christmas tree. The North Pole Central was a way to recapture memories of our past and it did not disappoint. Our grandchildren gathered around the tree taking turns running the train and pushing the buttons to make the noises. Unfortunately the train is put away until next Christmas, and one of our grand babies had a slight melt down when the train was not here.
customer_reviews.author: Siglaumo

customer_reviews.title: Great Train for around the tree
customer_reviews.text: Great train for around the tree, not sure about reviews saying the train was so loud you can't hear the 'train' noises, even at full speed speed you could hear all the sound effects clearly......would have given 5 stars but we want more track to 'extend' the trains set-up but it is hard to find have seen more straight track on Amazon but we want more straight and curved so we can expand the 'tree' set-up instead of just watching it go around the oval, I mean it's a Lionel you can't go wrong there, overall a darn good train set.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Lionel train. Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Lionel train is a big hit with my 2.5 year old grandson. He loves holding the remote control and watching it go around and around our Christmas tree. My only complaint is that the cars become disconnected from one another fairly easily. And I wish steam from locomotive was an option. But overall a great train for the money.
customer_reviews.author: GoDawgs82

customer_reviews.title: No volume adjustment
customer_reviews.text: The train is big and fun for the kids, but there is no volume adjustment so I feel as though it’s really loud. And if you don’t turn the train off after turning the remote off, a loud beeper keeps beeping until you turn it off. I just don’t love this as much as I was hoping to.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M. Willman

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Express.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our tree to entertain great-grandkids. THEY LOVE IT! It’s been up about a week. They’ve visited a couple of times and have a blast. After seeing their reaction, we bought the Hogwart’s Express for them. “All aboard!”
customer_reviews.author: Not too often.

customer_reviews.title: Great first train set
customer_reviews.text: A bit bigger than I expected but it ended up working out better that way. My 2 year old loves putting his cars and toys in place of the green boxes. The remote control is even easy enough for him to use. Great first train set. It does take 6 C batteries and 3 AAA. So make sure you've got them on hand.
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time the proudct is no good
customer_reviews.text: I got this train replace once prior to Christmas Day because all of sudden the train couldn’t Tavel around the tracks the wheels just wouldn’t spin. Then after Christmas the second train end up doing the same thing. Don’t waste your time the proudct is no good.
customer_reviews.author: Sha

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Kinda wanted to have a train as a decoration for christmas. But this train is too fun to put away. It huffs and hoots and talks. Easy to set up and easy to run. My inner 8 year old child is very happy right now. (That is just packing foam I cut up with a bread knife btw.)
customer_reviews.author: HighMileageFeets

customer_reviews.title: Second one in a row arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Second one in a row that arrived broken. There are some serious quality assurance issues with this train coming out of China. My son was really disappointed and sad when his main Christmas present didn’t work out of the box. We ordered a replacement and he waited for three days in anticipation only to have it arrive broken again. We even went out and bought different batteries to see if it was a battery issue. No success...I can’t describe the frustration and sadness I feel seeing my son have his hopes crushed.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great starter train for the Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: Cool little train for the price. Only giving it 4 stars because it doesn’t blow smoke, LED is on the weaker side and the sounds can’t be disabled. Other than that I found it to be a great train for under 100USD.
customer_reviews.author: Try DIY

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality train
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got this for our kids for Christmas. It is going to be something our family cherishes for years! It is well made and very pretty. I debated on which one to get. Reviews don't give a person much confidence because there is always negative ones, but I chose this one and I am so glad I did!!
customer_reviews.author: Abc123

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for toddler/kids..have lots of C and 9V batteries
customer_reviews.text: This train functions perfectly on my high pile rug! We have it underneath our tree. My son is two (will be 3 next month) and loves operating it with the remote control. I believe the train takes 6 C batteries and the remote is 2 9V...I’d suggest getting a huge stash for the season
customer_reviews.author: NC Turner

customer_reviews.title: Can't turn sound off.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Durable. Perfect for putting around a Christmas Tree. 7 year old Kid doesn't like the size...wants a smaller size with more box cars. When turned on, the sound can't be disabled. Constantly makes a sound, even when stopped. A sound disable switch or button would have been awesome and earned it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: I like the way this train has a wireless remote
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this train has a wireless remote. Our last one had a wire and you had to stand at a certain point to control the train. The train still derails a bit easy especially if you turn the speak just past neutral. The cars on the train are pretty average but at least it does look Christmasy.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Schreck

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great train. Good quality material for the price. The only thing i wish it had was the music but other than that great buy. In the video I demonstrated the functions (ie, sounds, reverse and forward motion) we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Keturah Buford

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas train
customer_reviews.text: I bought this train for my grandson to play with at Christmas. It was a total hit! I am glad it had a remote control that allowed him to choose between a whistle and an an announcement. It was appropriate for a 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: A PERFECT Holiday Train Set
customer_reviews.text: We have our new train set under our Christmas tree and it is PERFECT. Right size, wonderful sounds, and still plenty of room for gifts (and our cat!) under the tree. We couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Kimmell

customer_reviews.title: Great train for under tree!
customer_reviews.text: Train is exactly as advertised, works and looks great going around the tree with my Christmas Village. Can't wait for the Grand kids to come over to play with it. My old train was just a simple turn it on and watch it go. This one has buttons for the bell and whistle with speed control forward and reverse. The kids will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bob D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for two days!
customer_reviews.text: The train worked beautifully for the first two days. Then, for no reason, the bell, whistle and voice options stopped working. I changed the batteries and still they didn't work. Since my granddaughter liked these features the best, I consider the train a failure. What other option is there except to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Esther D. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: If my grandkids did not like it so well in spite of these problems or ...
customer_reviews.text: To me this train lacked the workmanship that I expected from Lionel. The detail was lacking and the obvious plastic showed. As for performance the train does not stay on the track and is difficult for children to accomplish. If my grandkids did not like it so well in spite of these problems or maybe because they like fixing things I would send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great train
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality train. Fun to play with. Assembly of tracks is tricky because the instructions weren’t that clear, but we figured it out. It’s pretty touchy when it comes to staying on the tracks. The kids barely touch it and it’s off, but they are 2 & 5 so....The kids love it. Just wish it sang songs. It only has a horn and a conductor talking but you can control that feature from the remote. Glad we splurged and got this brand over another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality piece
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved the remote and train! It’s a little large but I made it work . I set it up with our xmas village. It’s a piece that came together and everyone compliments us on it.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Cute but annoying
customer_reviews.text: The train is cute and good size for under the tree, but I would not buy again due to the sounds. There is no way to turn the sound off nor a volume to turn it down, and it is very loud. There’s an electrical “humming” sound along with a “chugging” train sound. And it is very annoying. Not something that can be kept on longer than five minutes Without wanting to pull your hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice train but question durability
customer_reviews.text: Sounds nice worked great at both speed forward and back but only worked for one year mine happened to break following Christmas but was after the year mark
customer_reviews.author: Jose ayala

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect starter train for our boys. Easy to set up and for them to interact with. Just a hint, have 6 C batteries handy!! So much fun we all played with it.
customer_reviews.author: JoeMama

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Just got it delivered today. Setup was super easy. I am very happy with the quality and durability for the price. The train cars feel really durable and well made. Looks great and runs great.
customer_reviews.author: SteveG

customer_reviews.title: Christmasy train
customer_reviews.text: This train is awesome. Design is very christmasy. One thing we like is that if the engine is turned to On but the remote is Off, the engine will beep to remind you to turn it off too. The track is larger than expected- maybe it says the diameter in the specs but I didn’t see that prior to purchase. Great train, great value. Kids LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed tonight on Christmas Eve, to be setting it up and anticipating my kids reaction, only to find the remote doesn't work. Expected more, I thought Lionel was a reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary J. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for something durable and affordable for a kid. We found this and got this for a Xmas gift and it’s been hours of entertainment. Our son is in love.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Burns

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: This train looks nice and is cute for under the tree, but it is super finicky and does not stay on the track well. It shouldn’t be so difficult to get each set of wheels lined up on the track. Very frustrating for my son, and for me and my husband as well. And if it’s not on a super slow setting it jumps the rails. We spend much more time adjusting it then actually enjoying it :(
customer_reviews.author: Katiebelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute Christmas tree train
customer_reviews.text: It is a super cute train, and it fit nicely under our Christmas tree. I wish there was a way to turn off the sound since I set it up after my kids went to bed.
customer_reviews.author: supermom

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It survived one Christmas so far without any issues. It is a well made, well-thought product and lots of fun. It really adds to the spirit of our Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Alfa Geek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect train set for Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 y/o son has an obsession with trains right now, so we knew we wanted to put a train under the train this year! We found this Lionel train set and it is absolutely perfect! Great addition to our Christmas tradition!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent train set.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding train set. After years of hassle with the Bachman Night Before Christmas tracks and continued derailments, this set track snapped together quickly, train ran perfectly & responded well to remote. Thank you Lionel.
customer_reviews.author: Johns

customer_reviews.title: Made my son happy but it's very cheaply made and 100% plastic
customer_reviews.text: Made my son happy but it's very cheaply made and 100% plastic. Track seems fragile and we'll see how long it lasts. For the $$ I can't complain but it's definitely not what I think of when I think "Lionel"
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking train
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but the connections are somewhat difficult to put together and easily disconnect when the train is running. The remote does its job well. The only thing that is lacking is the steam while running.
customer_reviews.author: Harout M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter train set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect train for Christmas tree. Great price. Not a train expert but was surprised at the quality and durability of the train cars. Nice remote..kid friendly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tnholt79

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Looked and ran great around the Christmas tree! Don't know for sure about durability, but looks like it should last if you are careful with it. The dog knocked it over a few times with no effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Train Set
customer_reviews.text: This Lionel battery train set is an excellent train set to put around the Christmas tree it works great and is very well made. Everyone that has seen it loves it and want's one for their tree.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great train
customer_reviews.text: New so could upgrade durability in future. Great improvement over others we had in past. Not so blooming loud! Kids love it around tree
customer_reviews.author: BargainHunter

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for under the Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: I bought this train set to go under the Christmas tree. It had 3 track options that made it possible to pick the right size for my tree. The widest width of 60 inches was perfect to fit around me tree skirt and still have enough room for the train to operate. The bell and whistle gives the train a cute aspect. I like the different sayings from the Conductor depending if the train is moving or not. The large remote is easy to work and has a speed option for both forward and reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Cerroni

customer_reviews.title: The tracks can be very fragile and the trains like to derail
customer_reviews.text: The tracks can be very fragile and the trains like to derail. You have to have the track super level for it to have the power to actually move. Audio kinda gets annoying being the same thing over and over. Wish I could mute it.
customer_reviews.author: Mattr05

customer_reviews.title: Won’t run on G-Scale track.
customer_reviews.text: Lionel’s large scale is smaller than LGB G-Scale so it will not run on G-scale track. On the cheap track it comes with it bumps along and the wheel cover comes off within two circles of the track. Sound effects are great and the price is good but it is a bit frustrating to use and kids lose interest.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: AAA for remote, 6 C for the train
customer_reviews.text: Needs two types of batteries. 6 C and 3 AAA. Disappointed about the fact it needed 6 C, not a type that a person just has on hand. I am not sure if the product description states that. Read post prior to purchasing and only found the part about the AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chrismas train
customer_reviews.text: Put this train around the Christmas tree. Looks great, runs well, only comes off the track when backing up. The sounds are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Festus

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas train
customer_reviews.text: This replaced our 25 year old under the Christmas tree train. It is a wonderful product and the remote control makes it so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: June Summer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good train. Works well once you get the track fitted together properly. I can run it full speed without running off the tracks. My only suggestion would be that it played Christmas music along with the sounds provided. The tracks are easy to put together and don't fit with any other gauge of train.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very first setup with brand new batteries and the simplest straight track the first motor cart does not even pull itself past one track. Easily falls off track. Looks beautiful and sound is good. Would return if I could.
customer_reviews.author: natalie vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great Train
customer_reviews.text: Came in a very nice box and setup was very easy. The train takes 6 C batteries which I thought was a little much. Other than that the remote works very well and my son loved the realisic sounds it made on xmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: THRILL A KID
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old grandson got this for Christmas and asks for it EVERYTIME he visits. Takes it off the tracks and runs it on the floor, rug & sidewalk. FUN.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Schluederberg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that the train does not consistently stay on the tracks. I regret making the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sinclare

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but loud.
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to get up and running. I have had no problem keeping the train on the tracks. The only downside, and I have to say, it is substantial, is that this train is VERY loud. You won't want to have it going if there is anything you are trying to watch or listen to nearby because the noise of the train will overpower it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Okay .. Train.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice train. The tracks just dont seem to stay together so the train consistantly runs off track. But all in all ita cute and gives our tree some pizazz as it circles around it.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy's World

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandchildren for Christmas. They had other toys, but kept going back to this train set. Ages 3 and 5
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Brings back childhood memories.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy feel and work beautifully...just what I was looking for at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kopin

customer_reviews.title: Great train for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful train and easy for a 4 year old to operate without having to worry they’ll break it! I do wish the Christmas train played music—then you’d have the ultimate Christmas train!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

product_meta.title: Lionel North Pole Central Battery-powered Model Train Set Ready to Play w/ Remote
product_meta.description:
Size:50 x 73"Ho! Ho! Ho! Merry Christmas! Celebrate the wonder of theseason with this North Pole Central Freight Set and bring thegoods from Santa’s top-secret location to your layout!With this Ready-to-Play set comes an exclusive track system which allows you to create; a circle, a rectangle or an oval layout. As this track system is exclusive to Ready-to-Play set, it is not compatible with Lionel G Gauge or other G Gauge track systems.

BRAND STORY
By Lionel Trains
feature_bullets: Set Includes: Battery-powered General-style locomotive and tender, Gondola with crate load, Center-cupola caboose, 24 curved and eight straight plastic track pieces, RC remote control
Locomotive Features: Authentic train sounds, including bell and whistle, Working headlight, Requires six C cell batteries (not included)
Freight Car Features: Fixed knuckle couplers, Removable crate load in gondola
Remote Control Features: Designed for easy use, Clearly marked buttons allow train to go forward andreverse, sound the whistle, and ring the bell, Requires three AAA batteries (not included)
Ready-to-Play | Set Length: 50" x 73" | Recommended Age: 4 years +. Scale type - semi-scale

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars961 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
